trans-unit.source: Adds the specified ChangeListener to the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 ChangeListener 添加到进度条。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified DragSourceListener to this DragSource to receive drag source events during drag operations initiated with this DragSource.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 DragSourceListener 添加到此 DragSource 中,以在由此 DragSource 启动的拖动操作期间接收拖动源事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified DragSourceListener to this DragSource to receive drag source events during drag operations initiated with this DragSource. If a null listener is specified, no action is taken and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 DragSourceListener 添加到此 DragSource 中,以在由此 DragSource 启动的拖动操作期间接收拖动源事件。如果指定了 null 侦听器，则不执行任何操作，也不会引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified DragSourceMotionListener to this DragSource to receive drag motion events during drag operations initiated with this DragSource.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 DragSourceMotionListener 添加到此 DragSource ,以在使用此 DragSource 启动的拖动操作期间接收拖动运动事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified DragSourceMotionListener to this DragSource to receive drag motion events during drag operations initiated with this DragSource. If a null listener is specified, no action is taken and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 DragSourceMotionListener 添加到此 DragSource ,以在使用此 DragSource 启动的拖动操作期间接收拖动运动事件。如果指定了 null 侦听器，则不执行任何操作，也不会引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified FocusListener to receive focus events from this component.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的 FocusListener 以接收来自此组件的焦点事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified ImageConsumer to the list of consumers interested in data for the filtered image.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 ImageConsumer 添加到对过滤后的图像的数据感兴趣的使用者列表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified ImageConsumer to the list of consumers interested in data for the filtered image. An instance of the original ImageFilter is created (using the filter's getFilterInstance method) to manipulate the image data for the specified ImageConsumer. The newly created filter instance is then passed to the addConsumer method of the original ImageProducer.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 ImageConsumer 添加到对过滤后的图像的数据感兴趣的使用者列表中。创建原始 ImageFilter 的实例（使用过滤器的 getFilterInstance 方法），以处理指定 ImageConsumer 的图像数据。然后，新创建的过滤器实例将传递到原始 ImageProducer 的 addConsumer 方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified Point to the bounds of this Rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 Point 添加到此 Rectangle 的边界中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified Accessible child of the object to the object's selection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象的可访问子对象添加到对象的选择中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified Accessible child of the object to the object's selection. If the object supports multiple selections, the specified child is added to any existing selection, otherwise it replaces any existing selection in the object. If the specified child is already selected, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的对象的可访问子对象添加到对象的选择中。如果对象支持多个选择,则指定的子代会被添加到任何现有的选择中,否则会替换对象中任何现有的选择。如果指定的子代已经被选中,则此方法没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive ActionEvents from this TrayIcon.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的操作侦听器以从此 TrayIcon 接收 ActionEvent 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive ActionEvents from this TrayIcon. Action events usually occur when a user selects the tray icon, using either the mouse or keyboard. The conditions in which action events are generated are platform-dependent.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的操作侦听器以从此 TrayIcon 接收 ActionEvent 。当用户使用鼠标或键盘选择任务栏图标时，通常会发生操作事件。生成动作事件的条件取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this button.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器来接收该按钮的动作事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this button. Action events occur when a user presses or releases the mouse over this button. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器来接收该按钮的动作事件。当用户在该按钮上按下或释放鼠标时,就会发生动作事件。如果l为空,则不会抛出异常,也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this list.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器,从该列表中接收动作事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this list. Action events occur when a user double-clicks on a list item or types Enter when the list has the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器来接收此列表中的动作事件,当用户双击列表项或在列表有键盘焦点时输入Enter时,就会发生动作事件。当用户双击列表项或在列表有键盘焦点时输入Enter时,就会发生动作事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this menu item.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器以接收来自该菜单项的动作事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this menu item. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器来接收来自该菜单项的动作事件。如果l为空,则不会产生异常,也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this text field.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器,以接收此文本字段的动作事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this text field. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器来接收来自这个文本字段的动作事件。如果l为空,则不会产生异常,也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified action listener to receive action events from this textfield.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的动作监听器,以便从该文本字段接收动作事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified adjustment listener to receive adjustment events from this ScrollPaneAdjustable.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的调整侦听器，以从此 ScrollPaneAdjustable 接收调整事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified adjustment listener to receive adjustment events from this ScrollPaneAdjustable. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的调整侦听器，以从此 ScrollPaneAdjustable 接收调整事件。如果 l 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified adjustment listener to receive instances of AdjustmentEvent from this scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的调整侦听器以从此滚动条接收 AdjustmentEvent 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified adjustment listener to receive instances of AdjustmentEvent from this scroll bar. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的调整侦听器以从此滚动条接收 AdjustmentEvent 的实例。如果l为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified attribute to this attribute set if it is not already present, first removing any existing in the same attribute category as the specified attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性尚未存在,则将其添加到此属性集,首先删除与指定属性值相同的属性类别中的任何现有属性。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified attribute to this attribute set if it is not already present, first removing any existing value in the same attribute category as the specified attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的属性尚未存在,则将其添加到该属性集,首先删除与指定属性值相同的属性类别中的任何现有值。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified attribute value to this attribute set if it is not already present, first removing any existing value in the same attribute category as the specified attribute value (optional operation).
trans-unit.target: 将指定的属性值添加到这个属性集中,如果它还不存在,首先要删除与指定属性值相同的属性类别中的任何现有值(可选操作)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified child Component.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的子 Component 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified child Component. This method is overridden to conditionally forward calls to the contentPane. By default, children are added to the contentPane instead of the frame, refer to RootPaneContainer for details.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的子 Component 。重写此方法可有条件地将调用转发到 contentPane 。默认情况下，将子级添加到 contentPane 而不是框架中，有关详细信息，请参考 RootPaneContainer 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component listener to receive component events from this component.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的组件监听器以接收该组件的组件事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component listener to receive component events from this component. If listener l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的组件侦听器以从该组件接收组件事件。如果侦听器 l 为 null ，则不会引发异常，也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the end of this container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到这个容器的末端。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the end of this container. Also notifies the layout manager to add the component to this container's layout using the specified constraints object. This is a convenience method for addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int).
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此容器的末尾。还通知布局管理器使用指定的约束对象将组件添加到此容器的布局中。这是 addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int) 的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the end of this list.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到该列表的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the end of this vector, increasing its size by one.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的分量添加到这个向量的末尾,使其大小增加一个。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the end of this vector, increasing its size by one. The capacity of this vector is increased if its size becomes greater than its capacity.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的分量添加到这个向量的末尾,使其大小增加一个。如果这个向量的大小大于其容量,则增加其容量。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout, using the specified constraints object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 constraints 对象将指定的组件添加到布局中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout, using the specified constraints object. Note that constraints are mutable and are, therefore, cloned when cached.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 constraints 对象将指定的组件添加到布局中。请注意，约束是可变的，因此在缓存时会被克隆。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout, using the specified constraint object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的约束对象,将指定的组件添加到布局中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout, using the specified constraint object. For border layouts, the constraint must be one of the following constants: NORTH, SOUTH, EAST, WEST, or CENTER.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的约束对象将指定的组件添加到布局中。对于边框布局，约束必须为以下常量之一： NORTH ， SOUTH ， EAST ， WEST 或 CENTER 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout, using the specified constraint object. Used by this class to know when to invalidate layout.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的约束对象,将指定的组件添加到布局中。该类用于知道何时失效布局。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到布局中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout. Not used by this class.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到布局中。本类不使用。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout. The layout is identified using one of:
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到布局中。布局使用以下其中一种标识。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to the layout. Used by this class to know when to invalidate layout.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到布局中。该类用于知道何时失效布局。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this card layout's internal table of names.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此卡布局的内部名称表中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this card layout's internal table of names. The object specified by constraints must be a string. The card layout stores this string as a key-value pair that can be used for random access to a particular card. By calling the show method, an application can display the component with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此卡布局的内部名称表中。 constraints 指定的对象必须是字符串。卡布局将此字符串作为键值对存储，可用于随机访问特定卡。通过调用 show 方法，应用程序可以显示具有指定名称的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container at the given position.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到给定位置的容器中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container at the given position. If index equals -1, the component will be appended to the end.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此容器中的给定位置。如果 index 等于-1，则该组件将附加到末尾。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container at the given position. This is a convenience method for addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int).
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此容器中的给定位置。这是 addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int) 的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container at the specified index, refer to Container.addImpl(Component, Object, int) for a complete description of this method.
trans-unit.target: 将指定组件添加到此容器的指定索引处，有关此方法的完整说明，请参考 Container.addImpl(Component, Object, int) 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到这个容器的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container at the specified index. This method also notifies the layout manager to add the component to this container's layout using the specified constraints object via the addLayoutComponent method.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此容器中的指定索引处。此方法还通知布局管理器，通过 addLayoutComponent 方法使用指定的约束对象将组件添加到此容器的布局中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container with the specified constraints at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到这个容器中,并在指定的索引上添加指定的约束。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container with the specified constraints at the specified index. Also notifies the layout manager to add the component to the this container's layout using the specified constraints object. This is a convenience method for addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int).
trans-unit.target: 将具有指定约束的指定组件添加到此容器，该约束位于指定索引处。还通知布局管理器使用指定的约束对象将组件添加到此容器的布局中。这是 addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int) 的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到这个容器中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this container. This is a convenience method for addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int).
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此容器。这是 addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int) 的便捷方法。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this scroll pane container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到这个滚动窗格容器中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this scroll pane container. If the scroll pane has an existing child component, that component is removed and the new one is added.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到滚动窗格容器中。如果滚动窗格有一个现有的子组件,则删除该组件并添加新的组件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this split pane.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此分割窗格中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component to this split pane. If constraints identifies the left/top or right/bottom child component, and a component with that identifier was previously added, it will be removed and then comp will be added in its place. If constraints is not one of the known identifiers the layout manager may throw an IllegalArgumentException.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的组件添加到此拆分窗格。如果 constraints 标识左/上或右/下子组件，并且以前添加了具​​有该标识符的组件，则将其删除，然后在其位置添加 comp 。如果 constraints 不是已知标识符之一，则布局管理器可能会抛出 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified component with the specified name to the layout.
trans-unit.target: 将指定名称的组件添加到布局中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified container listener to receive container events from this container.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的容器监听器以接收来自此容器的容器事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified container listener to receive container events from this container. If l is null, no exception is thrown and no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的容器监听器,以便从这个容器接收容器事件。如果l为空,则不会抛出异常,也不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element as the tail (last element) of this list.
trans-unit.target: 添加指定的元素作为这个列表的尾部(最后一个元素)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this job state reasons attribute if it is not already present.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚未存在,则将其添加到该工作状态原因属性中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this job state reasons attribute if it is not already present. The element to be added must be an instance of class JobStateReason. If this job state reasons attribute already contains the specified element, the call leaves this job state reasons attribute unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到此工作状态原因属性中。要添加的元素必须是 JobStateReason 类的实例。如果此作业状态原因属性已经包含指定的元素，则调用将使该作业状态原因属性保持不变，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this queue, waiting if necessary for another thread to receive it.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的元素添加到这个队列中,必要时等待另一个线程来接收它。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present (optional operation).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚未存在,则将其添加到该集合中(可选操作)。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present (optional operation). More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false. In combination with the restriction on constructors, this ensures that sets never contain duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中（可选操作）。更正式地讲，如果集合中不包含任何元素 e2 ，则将指定的元素 e 添加到该集合中，使得 (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)) 。如果此集合已经包含该元素，则调用将使该集合保持不变，并返回 false 。结合对构造函数的限制，这可以确保集合永远不会包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present (optional operation). More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that Objects.equals(e, e2). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false. In combination with the restriction on constructors, this ensures that sets never contain duplicate elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中（可选操作）。更正式地说，如果指定的元素 e 不包含 Objects.equals(e, e2) 这样的元素 e2 ，则将其添加到该集合中。如果此集合已经包含该元素，则调用将使该集合保持不变，并返回 false 。结合对构造函数的限制，这可以确保集合永远不会包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚未存在,则将其添加到该集合中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中。更正式地讲，如果集合中不包含任何元素 e2 ，则将指定的元素 e 添加到该集合中，使得 (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)) 。如果此集合已经包含元素，则调用将使集合保持不变，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that Objects.equals(e, e2). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中。更正式地说，如果指定的元素 e 不包含 Objects.equals(e, e2) 这样的元素 e2 ，则将其添加到该集合中。如果此集合已经包含该元素，则调用将使该集合保持不变并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if the set contains no element e2 such that e.equals(e2). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中。更正式地讲，如果集合中不包含元素 e2 使得 e.equals(e2) ，则将指定的元素 e 添加到该集合中。如果此集合已经包含元素，则调用将使集合保持不变，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if this set contains no element e2 such that (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中。更正式地说，如果此集合不包含元素 e2 ，则将指定的元素 e 添加到该集合中，从而使 (e==null ? e2==null : e.equals(e2)) 。如果此集合已经包含元素，则调用将使集合保持不变，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified element to this set if it is not already present. More formally, adds the specified element e to this set if this set contains no element e2 such that Objects.equals(e, e2). If this set already contains the element, the call leaves the set unchanged and returns false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的元素尚不存在，则将其添加到该集合中。更正式地，将指定的元件 e 这套如果这个集不包含任何元素 e2 ，使得 Objects.equals(e, e2) 。如果此集合已经包含该元素，则调用将使该集合保持不变，并返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified rows (inclusive) to the selection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的行(含)添加到选择中。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified rows (inclusive) to the selection. If the specified indices are within the viewable set of rows, or bound the viewable set of rows, then the specified indices are constrained by the viewable set of rows. If the indices are not within the viewable set of rows, or do not bound the viewable set of rows, then the selection is unchanged. For example, if the row count is 10, and this method is invoked with -1, 20, then the specified indices bounds the viewable range, and this is treated as if invoked with 0, 9. On the other hand, if this were invoked with -10, -1, then the specified indices do not bound the viewable set of rows, and the selection is unchanged.

trans-unit.source: Adjacent value parsing applies to each set of fixed width not-negative values in the parser that immediately follow any kind of value, variable or fixed width. Calling any other append method will end the setup of adjacent value parsing. Thus, in the unlikely event that you need to avoid adjacent value parsing behavior, simply add the appendValue to another DateTimeFormatterBuilder and add that to this builder.
trans-unit.target: 相邻值解析适用于解析器中紧随任何类型的值，可变或固定宽度之后的每组固定宽度非负值。调用任何其他append方法将结束相邻值解析的设置。因此，在极有可能需要避免相邻值解析行为的情况下，只需将 appendValue 添加到另一个 DateTimeFormatterBuilder 并将其添加到此构建器。

trans-unit.source: Adjusters are a key tool for modifying temporal objects. They exist to externalize the process of adjustment, permitting different approaches, as per the strategy design pattern. Examples might be an adjuster that sets the date avoiding weekends, or one that sets the date to the last day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 调整器是修改时间对象的一个关键工具。它们的存在是为了将调整过程外部化,允许按照策略设计模式采用不同的方法。例如,调整器可以避开周末设置日期,或者将日期设置为一个月的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: After a channel is closed, any further attempt to invoke I/O operations upon it will cause a ClosedChannelException to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 关闭通道后，任何进一步尝试在其上调用I / O操作的操作都将引发 ClosedChannelException 。

trans-unit.source: After a command in a batch update fails to execute properly and a BatchUpdateException is thrown, the driver may or may not continue to process the remaining commands in the batch. If the driver continues processing after a failure, the array returned by the method BatchUpdateException.getUpdateCounts will have an element for every command in the batch rather than only elements for the commands that executed successfully before the error. In the case where the driver continues processing commands, the array element for any command that failed is Statement.EXECUTE_FAILED.
trans-unit.target: 批处理更新中的命令无法正确执行并且抛出 BatchUpdateException 后，驱动程序可能会或可能不会继续处理批处理中的其余命令。如果驱动程序在失败后继续处理，则由 BatchUpdateException.getUpdateCounts 方法返回的数组将为批处理中的每个命令都具有一个元素，而不是对于在错误之前成功执行的命令仅具有一个元素。如果驱动程序继续处理命令，则任何失败的命令的数组元素为 Statement.EXECUTE_FAILED 。

trans-unit.source: After a file system is closed then all subsequent access to the file system, either by methods defined by this class or on objects associated with this file system, throw ClosedFileSystemException. If the file system is already closed then invoking this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 关闭文件系统后，随后通过此类定义的方法或与此文件系统关联的对象上的所有对该文件系统的后续访问都将引发 ClosedFileSystemException 。如果文件系统已经关闭，则调用此方法无效。

trans-unit.target: 关闭选择器后，除非通过调用此方法或 wakeup 方法，否则任何进一步使用它的尝试都会导致引发 ClosedSelectorException 。

trans-unit.source: After a successful invocation of this method, this recording is in the RUNNING state.
trans-unit.target: 成功调用此方法后，此记录处于 RUNNING 状态。

trans-unit.source: After a successful invocation of this method, this recording will be in the STOPPED state.
trans-unit.target: 成功调用此方法后，此记录将处于 STOPPED 状态。

trans-unit.source: After a watch service is closed, any further attempt to invoke operations upon it will throw ClosedWatchServiceException. If this watch service is already closed then invoking this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 关闭监视服务后，对其进行任何其他调用操作的尝试都将引发 ClosedWatchServiceException 。如果此监视服务已关闭，则调用此方法无效。

trans-unit.source: After adding a Point, a call to contains with the added Point as an argument does not necessarily return true. The contains method does not return true for points on the right or bottom edges of a Rectangle. Therefore if the added Point falls on the right or bottom edge of the enlarged Rectangle, contains returns false for that Point. If the specified point must be contained within the new Rectangle, a 1x1 rectangle should be added instead:
trans-unit.target: 添加 Point 后，以添加的 Point 作为参数的 contains 调用不一定返回 true 。对于 Rectangle 的右侧或底部边缘上的点， contains 方法不会返回 true 。因此，如果添加的 Point 落在放大的右侧或底部边缘 Rectangle ， contains 返回 false 该 Point 。如果指定点必须包含在新 Rectangle 中，则应添加1x1矩形：

trans-unit.source: After adding a point, a call to contains with the added point as an argument does not necessarily return true. The contains method does not return true for points on the right or bottom edges of a Rectangle. Therefore, if the added point falls on the right or bottom edge of the enlarged Rectangle, contains returns false for that point. If the specified point must be contained within the new Rectangle, a 1x1 rectangle should be added instead:
trans-unit.target: 添加一个点后，以添加的点作为参数的对 contains 的调用不一定返回 true 。对于 Rectangle 的右侧或底部边缘上的点， contains 方法不会返回 true 。因此，如果添加的点落在放大的右侧或底部边缘 Rectangle ， contains 返回 false 针对该点。如果指定点必须包含在新 Rectangle 中，则应添加1x1矩形：

trans-unit.source: After adding a point, a call to contains with the added point as an argument does not necessarily return true. The contains method does not return true for points on the right or bottom edges of a rectangle. Therefore, if the added point falls on the left or bottom edge of the enlarged rectangle, contains returns false for that point.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个点后，以添加的点作为参数的对 contains 的调用不一定返回 true 。对于矩形的右侧或底部边缘上的点， contains 方法不会返回 true 。因此，如果添加的点落在放大的矩形的左侧或底部边缘，则 contains 该点的 false 返回。

trans-unit.source: After adding an AWT event listener, malicious code may scan all AWT events dispatched in the system, allowing it to read all user input (such as passwords). Each AWT event listener is called from within the context of that event queue's EventDispatchThread, so if the accessEventQueue permission is also enabled, malicious code could modify the contents of AWT event queues system-wide, causing the application or applet to misbehave in an insecure manner.
trans-unit.target: 添加AWT事件监听器后,恶意代码可能会扫描系统中调度的所有AWT事件,使其能够读取所有用户输入的内容(如密码)。每个AWT事件监听器都是从该事件队列的EventDispatchThread上下文中调用的,所以如果访问EventQueue权限也被启用,恶意代码就可能修改全系统的AWT事件队列的内容,导致应用程序或小程序行为不安全。

trans-unit.source: After an application has attempted to synchronize a RowSet object with the data source (by calling the CachedRowSet method acceptChanges), and one or more conflicts have been found, a rowset's SyncProvider object creates an instance of SyncResolver. This new SyncResolver object has the same number of rows and columns as the RowSet object that was attempting the synchronization. The SyncResolver object contains the values from the data source that caused the conflict(s) and null for all other values. In addition, it contains information about each conflict.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序尝试将 RowSet 对象与数据源同步后（通过调用 CachedRowSet 方法 acceptChanges ），并且发现一个或多个冲突，行集的 SyncProvider 对象将创建 SyncResolver 的实例。这个新的 SyncResolver 对象与尝试同步的 RowSet 对象具有相同的行数和列数。所述 SyncResolver 对象包含从导致冲突（多个）和数据源中的值 null 的所有其他值。此外，它包含有关每个冲突的信息。

trans-unit.source: After an event class is defined, instances can be created (event objects). Data is stored in the event by assigning data to fields. Event timing can be explicitly controlled by using the begin and end methods available in the Event class.
trans-unit.target: 定义事件类之后，可以创建实例（事件对象）。通过将数据分配给字段将数据存储在事件中。通过使用 Event 类中可用的 begin 和 end 方法，可以显式控制事件计时。

trans-unit.source: After an event is allocated and its field members are populated, it can be written to the Flight Recorder system by using the commit() method.
trans-unit.target: 分配事件并填充其字段成员后，可以使用 commit() 方法将其写入Flight Recorder系统。

trans-unit.source: After an explicit open (either before or after implicit opens), the device will not be closed by implicit closing. The only way to close an explicitly opened device is an explicit close.
trans-unit.target: 在显式打开之后(无论是在隐式打开之前还是之后),设备将不会被隐式关闭。关闭显式打开的设备的唯一方法是显式关闭。

trans-unit.source: After construction, the initial delay and the between-event delay can be changed independently, and additional ActionListeners may be added.
trans-unit.target: 构造后，可以独立更改初始延迟和事件之间的延迟，并可以添加其他 ActionListeners 。

trans-unit.source: After detaching from the virtual machine, any further attempt to invoke operations on that virtual machine will cause an IOException to be thrown. If an operation (such as loadAgent for example) is in progress when this method is invoked then the behaviour is implementation dependent. In other words, it is implementation specific if the operation completes or throws IOException.
trans-unit.target: 从虚拟机分离后，任何进一步尝试在该虚拟机上调用操作的操作都将引发 IOException 。如果在调用此方法时正在进行某个操作（例如 loadAgent ），则该行为取决于实现。换句话说，该操作是否完成或引发 IOException 是特定于实现的。

trans-unit.source: After digits are obtained for the integer part, fractional part, and exponent (as appropriate for the data type), the following transformation is applied:
trans-unit.target: 在获得整数部分、分数部分和指数(适合数据类型)的数字后,应用以下转换。

trans-unit.source: After every group has been converted to a character by this process, the characters are gathered, in the same order in which their corresponding groups were read from the input stream, to form a String, which is returned.
trans-unit.target: 通过此过程将每个组转换为字符后，将按照从输入流中读取其相应组的顺序收集字符，以形成 String ，然后将其返回。

trans-unit.source: After execution of the terminal stream operation there are no guarantees that the reader will be at a specific position from which to read the next character or line.
trans-unit.target: 在执行终端流操作后,并不能保证读取器会在特定的位置上读取下一个字符或行。

trans-unit.source: After invoking the insertString() method, the Element structure would look like the one shown in Figure 3.
trans-unit.target: 调用 insertString() 方法之后，Element结构将类似于图3所示。

trans-unit.source: After invoking this method, subsequent invocations of the iterator or stream methods will lazily locate providers (and instantiate in the case of iterator) from scratch, just as is done by a newly-created service loader.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，的后续调用 iterator 或 stream 的方法将懒惰地定位提供者（和实例化的情况下， iterator ）从头，就像是由新创建的服务加载完成。

trans-unit.source: After invoking this method, subsequent invocations of the iterator method will lazily look up and instantiate providers from scratch, just as is done by a newly-created loader.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之后， iterator 方法的后续调用将懒惰地查找并实例化提供程序，就像新创建的加载程序一样。

trans-unit.source: After invoking this method, the Transformer must continue with the transformation. It should still be possible for the application to process the document through to the end.
trans-unit.target: 在调用该方法后,Transformer必须继续进行转换。应用程序仍应能将文档处理到底。

trans-unit.source: After invoking this method, the parser may stop processing by throwing a SAXException, or implement a feature that can direct it to continue after a fatal error. In the later case, it may report events on the rest of the document without any guarantee of correctness.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法后，解析器可能会通过抛出 SAXException 来停止处理，或者实现可导致致命错误后继续进行处理的功能。在后一种情况下，它可能会报告文档其余部分的事件，而没有任何正确性的保证。

trans-unit.source: After membership is dropped it may still be possible to receive datagrams sent to the group. This can arise when datagrams are waiting to be received in the socket's receive buffer. After membership is dropped then the channel may join the group again in which case a new membership key is returned.
trans-unit.target: 删除成员资格后，仍然有可能接收发送到该组的数据报。当数据报正在等待在套接字的接收缓冲区中接收时，可能会出现这种情况。删除成员资格后，频道可以再次 join 该组，在这种情况下，将返回新的成员资格密钥。

trans-unit.source: After membership is dropped it may still be possible to receive datagrams sent to the group. This can arise when datagrams are waiting to be received in the socket's receive buffer. After membership is dropped then the channel may join the group again in which case a new membership key is returned.
trans-unit.target: 删除成员资格后，仍然有可能接收发送到该组的数据报。当数据报正在等待在套接字的接收缓冲区中接收时，可能会出现这种情况。删除成员资格后，频道可以再次 join 该组，在这种情况下，将返回新的成员资格密钥。

trans-unit.source: After passing the initial "level" check, the Logger will call this Filter to check if a log record should really be published.
trans-unit.target: 在通过最初的 "级别 "检查后,记录仪将调用该过滤器来检查是否真的应该发布日志记录。

trans-unit.source: After passing this initial (cheap) test, the Logger will allocate a LogRecord to describe the logging message. It will then call a Filter (if present) to do a more detailed check on whether the record should be published. If that passes it will then publish the LogRecord to its output Handlers. By default, loggers also publish to their parent's Handlers, recursively up the tree.
trans-unit.target: 在通过这个初始(廉价)测试后,记录器将分配一个日志记录来描述记录消息。然后,它将调用一个过滤器(如果存在的话)来对记录是否应该被发布进行更详细的检查。如果通过,它将把日志记录发布到其输出处理程序。默认情况下,日志记录器也会向其父级处理程序发布,并在树上递归。

The following lines of code demonstrate using the method populate. Note that this version of the method takes two parameters, a ResultSet handle and the row in the ResultSet object from which to start retrieving rows.
trans-unit.target: 设置属性后，必须使用方法 populate 或方法 execute 填充 CachedRowSet 对象的数据。以下代码行演示了如何使用 populate 方法。请注意，此版本的方法采用两个参数，一个 ResultSet 句柄和 ResultSet 对象中的行，从该行开始检索行。

trans-unit.source: After removing client from the list of connections, this method calls closeClient(client).
trans-unit.target: 从连接列表中删除 client 后，此方法将调用 closeClient(client) 。

trans-unit.target: 从连接列表中删除 client 后，此方法将调用 closeClient(client) 。

trans-unit.source: After removing the object from the RMI runtime, the group must inform its ActivationMonitor (via the monitor's inactiveObject method) that the remote object is not currently active so that the remote object will be re-activated by the activator upon a subsequent activation request.
trans-unit.target: 从RMI运行时中删除对象之后，组必须（通过监视器的 inactiveObject 方法）通知其 ActivationMonitor 远程对象当前未处于活动状态，以便激活器根据后续的激活请求将其重新激活。

trans-unit.source: After retrieving the AWT event queue, malicious code may peek at and even remove existing events from its event queue, as well as post bogus events which may purposefully cause the application or applet to misbehave in an insecure manner.
trans-unit.target: 在检索到AWT事件队列后,恶意代码可能会偷看甚至删除其事件队列中的现有事件,以及发布虚假事件,这些事件可能会故意导致应用程序或小程序以不安全的方式进行错误行为。

trans-unit.source: After rounding for the precision, the formatting of the resulting magnitude
trans-unit.target: 在四舍五入后,对产生的幅度进行格式化处理。

trans-unit.source: After stream pipeline execution completes, this scanner is left in an indeterminate state and cannot be reused.
trans-unit.target: 在流管道执行完成后,该扫描器将处于不确定状态,不能重复使用。

trans-unit.source: After successful authentication, a user Principal can be associated with a particular Subject to augment that Subject with an additional identity. Authorization decisions can then be based upon the Principals that are associated with a Subject.
trans-unit.target: 成功通过身份验证后，可以将用户 Principal 与特定 Subject 相关联，以通过附加身份扩充该 Subject 。然后，可以根据与 Subject 关联的 Principal 做出授权决策。

trans-unit.source: After the AccessController.getContext method receives the combined stack of ProtectionDomains back from the DomainCombiner, it returns a new AccessControlContext that has both the combined ProtectionDomains as well as the DomainCombiner.
trans-unit.target: 在 AccessController.getContext 方法从 DomainCombiner 返回组合的ProtectionDomains堆栈后，它返回一个新的AccessControlContext，该控件同时具有组合的ProtectionDomains和 DomainCombiner 。

trans-unit.source: After the WebSocket has been built, the actual subprotocol can be queried through WebSocket.getSubprotocol().
trans-unit.target: 构建 WebSocket 之后，可以通过 WebSocket.getSubprotocol() 查询实际的子协议。

trans-unit.source: After the finalize method has been invoked for an object, no further action is taken until the Java virtual machine has again determined that there is no longer any means by which this object can be accessed by any thread that has not yet died, including possible actions by other objects or classes which are ready to be finalized, at which point the object may be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在为对象调用 finalize 方法之后，直到Java虚拟机再次确定不再有任何方法可以由尚未死亡的任何线程访问该对象之后，才采取进一步的措施，包括可能的措施可以通过其他准备完成的对象或类来完成，此时可以丢弃该对象。

trans-unit.source: After the context has been established or the isProtReady method returns true, the query routines can be invoked to determine the actual characteristics and services of the established context. The application can also start using the per-message methods of wrap and getMIC to obtain cryptographic operations on application supplied data.
trans-unit.target: 在建立上下文或 isProtReady 方法返回 true 之后，可以调用查询例程来确定所建立上下文的实际特征和服务。应用程序还可以开始使用 wrap 和 getMIC 的每个消息方法来获取对应用程序提供的数据的加密操作。

trans-unit.target: 写完条目后,输出流被刷新。在本方法返回后,输出流仍然开放。

trans-unit.source: After the group is created, the ActivationSystem is informed that the group is active by calling the activeGroup method which returns the ActivationMonitor for the group. The application need not call activeGroup independently since it is taken care of by this method.
trans-unit.target: 创建组后，可以通过调用 activeGroup 方法来通知 ActivationSystem 该组处于活动状态，该方法将返回该组的 ActivationMonitor 。该应用程序不必独立调用 activeGroup ,因为它由该方法处理。

trans-unit.source: After the protocol version there must be a space, followed by the implementation name. The format of the implementation name is unspecified. It is recommended that it include an implementation version number. An implementation can use an empty string as its implementation name, for example for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: 在协议版本之后必须有一个空格,然后是实施名称。实施名称的格式未作规定。建议它包括一个实现版本号。例如,出于安全考虑,实施例可以使用空字符串作为其实施例名称。

trans-unit.source: After the service provider has sent the extended operation request to the LDAP server, it will receive a response from the server. If the operation failed, the provider will throw a NamingException. If the operation succeeded, the provider will invoke this method using the data that it got back in the response. It is the job of this method to return a class that implements the ExtendedResponse interface that is appropriate for the extended operation request.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者向LDAP服务器发送扩展操作请求后,将收到服务器的响应。如果操作失败,提供者将抛出一个NamingException。如果操作成功,提供者将使用它在响应中得到的数据来调用这个方法。这个方法的工作就是返回一个实现ExtendedResponse接口的类,这个类适合扩展操作请求。

trans-unit.source: After this method returns, then any subsequent I/O exception that occurs while reading from the file or when a malformed or unmappable byte sequence is read, is wrapped in an UncheckedIOException that will be thrown from the Stream method that caused the read to take place. In case an IOException is thrown when closing the file, it is also wrapped as an UncheckedIOException.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回后，然后在从文件读取或读取格式错误或不可映射的字节序列时发生的任何后续I / O异常都包装在 UncheckedIOException 中，该异常将从 Stream 方法中引发，导致读取发生。在情况下， IOException 的抛出关闭文件时，它也被缠绕作为 UncheckedIOException 。

trans-unit.source: All CertPath objects are also Serializable. CertPath objects are resolved into an alternate CertPathRep object during serialization. This allows a CertPath object to be serialized into an equivalent representation regardless of its underlying implementation.

trans-unit.source: All CertPath objects have a type, a list of Certificates, and one or more supported encodings. Because the CertPath class is immutable, a CertPath cannot change in any externally visible way after being constructed. This stipulation applies to all public fields and methods of this class and any added or overridden by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 所有 CertPath 对象都有一个类型，一个 Certificate 列表以及一个或多个受支持的编码。由于 CertPath 类是不可变的，因此 CertPath 构造后无法以任何外部可见的方式进行更改。此规定适用于此类的所有公共字段和方法，以及由子类添加或覆盖的任何公共字段和方法。

trans-unit.source: All CertPath objects must be thread-safe. That is, multiple threads may concurrently invoke the methods defined in this class on a single CertPath object (or more than one) with no ill effects. This is also true for the List returned by CertPath.getCertificates.
trans-unit.target: 所有 CertPath 对象必须是线程安全的。也就是说，多个线程可以在单个 CertPath 对象（或多个）上并发调用此类中定义的方法，而不会产生不良影响。对于 CertPath.getCertificates 返回的 List 也是如此。

trans-unit.source: All ComponentUIs typically need to set various properties on the JComponent the ComponentUI is providing the look and feel for. This is typically done when the ComponentUI is installed on the JComponent. Setting a property should only be done if the developer has not set the property. For non-primitive values it is recommended that the ComponentUI only change the property on the JComponent if the current value is null or implements UIResource. If the current value is null or implements UIResource it indicates the property has not been set by the developer, and the ui is free to change it. For example, BasicButtonUI.installDefaults only changes the font on the JButton if the return value from button.getFont() is null or implements UIResource. On the other hand if button.getFont() returned a non-null value that did not implement UIResource then BasicButtonUI.installDefaults would not change the JButton's font.
trans-unit.target: 通常，所有 ComponentUIs 需要在 ComponentUI 提供外观的 JComponent 上设置各种属性。通常在 ComponentUI 安装在 JComponent 上时完成此操作。仅当开发人员尚未设置属性时，才应设置属性。对于非原始值，建议 ComponentUI 仅在当前值为 null 或实现 UIResource 时更改 JComponent 的属性。如果当前值为 null 或实现 UIResource 它表明该属性尚未由开发人员设置，并且ui可以自由更改它。例如， BasicButtonUI.installDefaults 仅改变对所述字体 JButton 如果从返回值 button.getFont() 是 null 或器具 UIResource 的。另一方面，如果 button.getFont() 返回一个未实现 UIResource 的 non-null 值，则 BasicButtonUI.installDefaults 不会更改 JButton 的字体。

trans-unit.source: All PKIXCertPathBuilderResult objects contain the certification path constructed by the build algorithm, the valid policy tree and subject public key resulting from the build algorithm, and a TrustAnchor describing the certification authority (CA) that served as a trust anchor for the certification path.
trans-unit.target: 所有 PKIXCertPathBuilderResult 对象都包含由构建算法构建的认证路径，由构建算法生成的有效策略树和主题公共密钥，以及描述认证机构（CA）的 TrustAnchor （充当认证路径的信任锚）。

trans-unit.source: All PKIXCertPathValidatorResult objects contain the valid policy tree and subject public key resulting from the validation algorithm, as well as a TrustAnchor describing the certification authority (CA) that served as a trust anchor for the certification path.
trans-unit.target: 所有 PKIXCertPathValidatorResult 对象均包含有效策略树和由验证算法得出的主题公共密钥，以及描述证书颁发机构（CA）的 TrustAnchor ,该证书颁发机构用作证书路径的信任锚。

trans-unit.source: All PolicyNode objects must be immutable and thread-safe. Multiple threads may concurrently invoke the methods defined in this class on a single PolicyNode object (or more than one) with no ill effects. This stipulation applies to all public fields and methods of this class and any added or overridden by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 所有 PolicyNode 对象必须是不可变的并且是线程安全的。多个线程可以在单个 PolicyNode 对象（或多个）上并发调用此类中定义的方法，而不会产生不良影响。此规定适用于此类的所有公共字段和方法，以及由子类添加或覆盖的任何公共字段和方法。

trans-unit.source: All PolicyQualifierInfo objects must be immutable and thread-safe. That is, multiple threads may concurrently invoke the methods defined in this class on a single PolicyQualifierInfo object (or more than one) with no ill effects. Requiring PolicyQualifierInfo objects to be immutable and thread-safe allows them to be passed around to various pieces of code without worrying about coordinating access.
trans-unit.target: 所有 PolicyQualifierInfo 对象必须是不可变的并且是线程安全的。也就是说，多个线程可以在单个 PolicyQualifierInfo 对象（或多个）上并发调用此类中定义的方法，而不会产生不良影响。要求 PolicyQualifierInfo 对象是不可变的并且是线程安全的，才能将它们传递给各种代码段，而不必担心协调访问。

trans-unit.source: All ReadWriteLock implementations must guarantee that the memory synchronization effects of writeLock operations (as specified in the Lock interface) also hold with respect to the associated readLock. That is, a thread successfully acquiring the read lock will see all updates made upon previous release of the write lock.
trans-unit.target: 所有 ReadWriteLock 实现都必须保证 writeLock 操作（如 Lock 接口中所指定）的内存同步效果对于关联的 readLock 也成立。也就是说，成功获取读锁的线程将看到在先前释放写锁时所做的所有更新。

trans-unit.source: All TrustAnchor objects must be immutable and thread-safe. That is, multiple threads may concurrently invoke the methods defined in this class on a single TrustAnchor object (or more than one) with no ill effects. Requiring TrustAnchor objects to be immutable and thread-safe allows them to be passed around to various pieces of code without worrying about coordinating access. This stipulation applies to all public fields and methods of this class and any added or overridden by subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 所有 TrustAnchor 对象必须是不可变的并且是线程安全的。也就是说，多个线程可以在单个 TrustAnchor 对象（或多个）上并发调用此类中定义的方法，而不会产生不良影响。要求 TrustAnchor 对象是不可变的并且是线程安全的，这样就可以将它们传递给各种代码，而不必担心协调访问。此规定适用于此类的所有公共字段和方法，以及由子类添加或覆盖的任何公共字段和方法。

trans-unit.source: All get*(*) methods operate in the current scope for Namespace URI and prefix resolution.
trans-unit.target: 所有 get*(*) 方法都在当前范围内用于名称空间URI和前缀解析。

trans-unit.source: All input.remaining() bytes starting at input.position() are processed. If an AEAD mode such as GCM/CCM is being used, the authentication tag is appended in the case of encryption, or verified in the case of decryption. The result is stored in the output buffer. Upon return, the input buffer's position will be equal to its limit; its limit will not have changed. The output buffer's position will have advanced by n, where n is the value returned by this method; the output buffer's limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 所有 input.remaining() 字节开始于 input.position() 都被处理。如果使用的是AEAD模式（例如GCM / CCM），则在加密的情况下会附加验证标签，而在解密的情况下会验证身份标签。结果存储在输出缓冲区中。返回时，输入缓冲区的位置将等于其限制；它的限制不会改变。输出缓冲区的位置将前进n，其中n是此方法返回的值；输出缓冲区的限制将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: All input.remaining() bytes starting at input.position() are processed. The result is stored in the output buffer. Upon return, the input buffer's position will be equal to its limit; its limit will not have changed. The output buffer's position will have advanced by n, where n is the value returned by this method; the output buffer's limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 所有 input.remaining() 字节开始于 input.position() 都被处理。结果存储在输出缓冲区中。返回时，输入缓冲区的位置将等于其限制；它的限制不会改变。输出缓冲区的位置将前进n，其中n是此方法返回的值；输出缓冲区的限制将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: All null paths in pPaths are ignored.
trans-unit.target: pPaths 中的所有 null 路径都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: All schedule methods accept relative delays and periods as arguments, not absolute times or dates. It is a simple matter to transform an absolute time represented as a Date to the required form. For example, to schedule at a certain future date, you can use: schedule(task, date.getTime() - System.currentTimeMillis(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS). Beware however that expiration of a relative delay need not coincide with the current Date at which the task is enabled due to network time synchronization protocols, clock drift, or other factors.
trans-unit.target: 所有 schedule 方法都接受相对延迟和周期作为参数，而不是绝对时间或日期作为参数。将代表 Date 的绝对时间转换为所需的形式很简单。例如，要在某个将来的 date 进行调度，可以使用： schedule(task, date.getTime() - System.currentTimeMillis(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS) 。但是请注意，由于网络时间同步协议，时钟漂移或其他因素，相对延迟的到期时间不必与启用任务的当前 Date 一致。

trans-unit.source: All src.remaining() bytes starting at src.position() are processed. Upon return, the input buffer's position will be equal to its limit; its limit will not have changed.
trans-unit.target: 所有 src.remaining() 字节开始于 src.position() 都被处理。返回时，输入缓冲区的位置将等于其限制；它的限制不会改变。

trans-unit.source: All async methods without an explicit Executor argument are performed using the ForkJoinPool.commonPool() (unless it does not support a parallelism level of at least two, in which case, a new Thread is created to run each task). This may be overridden for non-static methods in subclasses by defining method defaultExecutor(). To simplify monitoring, debugging, and tracking, all generated asynchronous tasks are instances of the marker interface CompletableFuture.AsynchronousCompletionTask. Operations with time-delays can use adapter methods defined in this class, for example: supplyAsync(supplier, delayedExecutor(timeout, timeUnit)). To support methods with delays and timeouts, this class maintains at most one daemon thread for triggering and cancelling actions, not for running them.
trans-unit.target: 所有没有显式Executor参数的异步方法都是使用 ForkJoinPool.commonPool() 执行的（除非它不支持并行度至少为2，在这种情况下，将创建一个新的Thread来运行每个任务）。对于子类中的非静态方法，可以通过定义方法 defaultExecutor() 来重写此方法。为了简化监视，调试和跟踪，所有生成的异步任务都是标记接口 CompletableFuture.AsynchronousCompletionTask 的实例。具有时间延迟的操作可以使用此类中定义的适配器方法，例如： supplyAsync(supplier, delayedExecutor(timeout, timeUnit)) 。为了支持具有延迟和超时的方法，此类最多维护一个守护线程来触发和取消动作，而不是运行它们。

trans-unit.source: All async methods without an explicit Executor argument are performed using the ForkJoinPool.commonPool() (unless it does not support a parallelism level of at least two, in which case, a new Thread is created to run each task). To simplify monitoring, debugging, and tracking, all generated asynchronous tasks are instances of the marker interface CompletableFuture.AsynchronousCompletionTask.
trans-unit.target: 所有没有显式Executor参数的异步方法都是使用 ForkJoinPool.commonPool() 执行的（除非它不支持并行度至少为2，在这种情况下，将创建一个新的Thread来运行每个任务）。为了简化监视，调试和跟踪，所有生成的异步任务都是标记接口 CompletableFuture.AsynchronousCompletionTask 的实例。

trans-unit.source: All CompletionStage methods are implemented independently of other public methods, so the behavior of one method is not impacted by overrides of others in subclasses.
trans-unit.target: 所有的CompletionStage方法都是独立于其他公共方法实现的,所以一个方法的行为不会因为子类中其他方法的重写而受到影响。

trans-unit.source: All CompletionStage methods return CompletableFutures. To restrict usages to only those methods defined in interface CompletionStage, use method minimalCompletionStage(). Or to ensure only that clients do not themselves modify a future, use method copy().
trans-unit.target: 所有CompletionStage方法都返回CompletableFutures。要将用法限制为仅在接口CompletionStage中定义的那些方法，请使用 minimalCompletionStage() 方法。或者，要确保仅客户端自己不会修改将来，请使用方法 copy() 。

trans-unit.source: All Events are constructed with a reference to the object, the "source", that is logically deemed to be the object upon which the Event in question initially occurred upon.
trans-unit.target: 所有的事件都是以 "源 "这个对象为参照来构建的,这个对象在逻辑上被认为是相关事件最初发生的对象。

trans-unit.source: All HTML element interfaces derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: 所有的HTML元素接口都来自这个类。

trans-unit.source: All HTML element interfaces derive from this class. Elements that only expose the HTML core attributes are represented by the base HTMLElement interface. These elements are as follows: HEAD special: SUB, SUP, SPAN, BDO font: TT, I, B, U, S, STRIKE, BIG, SMALL phrase: EM, STRONG, DFN, CODE, SAMP, KBD, VAR, CITE, ACRONYM, ABBR list: DD, DT NOFRAMES, NOSCRIPT ADDRESS, CENTER The style attribute of an HTML element is accessible through the ElementCSSInlineStyle interface which is defined in the .
trans-unit.target: 所有HTML元素接口都派生自此类。仅公开HTML核心属性的元素由基本 HTMLElement 接口表示。这些元素如下：HEAD特殊：SUB，SUP，SPAN，BDO字体：TT，I，B，U，S，STRIKE，BIG，SMALL短语：EM，STRONG，DFN，CODE，SAMP，KBD，VAR，CITE ，ACRONYM，ABBR列表：DD，DT NOFRAMES，NOSCRIPT ADDRESS，CENTER可通过在中定义的 ElementCSSInlineStyle 接口访问HTML元素的 style 属性。

trans-unit.source: All Identity objects have a name and a public key. Names are immutable. Identities may also be scoped. That is, if an Identity is specified to have a particular scope, then the name and public key of the Identity are unique within that scope.
trans-unit.target: 所有的Identity对象都有一个名字和一个公钥。名字是不可改变的。个人信息也可以被限定范围。也就是说,如果一个Identity被指定为有一个特定的范围,那么该Identity的名称和公钥在该范围内是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: All Kerberos JAAS login modules that authenticate a user to a KDC should use this class. Where available, the login module might even read this information from a ticket cache in the operating system instead of directly communicating with the KDC. During the commit phase of the JAAS authentication process, the JAAS login module should instantiate this class and store the instance in the private credential set of a Subject.
trans-unit.target: 所有向KDC验证用户身份的Kerberos JAAS登录模块都应使用此类。在可用的情况下，登录模块甚至可以从操作系统中的票证缓存中读取此信息，而不是直接与KDC通信。在JAAS身份验证过程的提交阶段，JAAS登录模块应实例化此类并将实例存储在 Subject 的私有证书集中。

trans-unit.source: All Kerberos JAAS login modules that authenticate a user to a KDC should use this class. Where available, the login module might even read this information from a ticket cache in the operating system instead of directly communicating with the KDC. During the commit phase of the JAAS authentication process, the JAAS login module should instantiate this class and store the instance in the private credential set of a Subject.
trans-unit.target: 所有向KDC验证用户身份的Kerberos JAAS登录模块都应使用此类。在可用的情况下，登录模块甚至可以从操作系统中的票证缓存中读取此信息，而不是直接与KDC通信。在JAAS身份验证过程的提交阶段，JAAS登录模块应实例化此类并将实例存储在 Subject 的私有证书集中。

trans-unit.source: All Kerberos JAAS login modules that obtain a principal's password and generate the secret key from it should use this class. Sometimes, such as when authenticating a server in the absence of user-to-user authentication, the login module will store an instance of this class in the private credential set of a Subject during the commit phase of the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 所有获取主体密码并从中生成密钥的Kerberos JAAS登录模块都应使用此类。有时，例如在没有用户对用户的身份验证的情况下对服务器进行身份验证时，登录模块会在身份验证过程的提交阶段将此类的实例存储在 Subject 的私有凭据集中。

trans-unit.source: All Kerberos JAAS login modules that obtain a principal's password and generate the secret key from it should use this class. Sometimes, such as when authenticating a server in the absence of user-to-user authentication, the login module will store an instance of this class in the private credential set of a Subject during the commit phase of the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 所有获取主体密码并从中生成密钥的Kerberos JAAS登录模块都应使用此类。有时，例如在没有用户对用户身份验证的情况下对服务器进行身份验证时，登录模块会在身份验证过程的提交阶段将此类的实例存储在 Subject 的私有凭据集中。

trans-unit.source: All OUT parameters must be registered before a stored procedure is executed.
trans-unit.target: 在执行存储过程之前,必须注册所有的OUT参数。

trans-unit.source: All SAX interfaces are assumed to be synchronous: the parse methods must not return until parsing is complete, and readers must wait for an event-handler callback to return before reporting the next event.
trans-unit.target: 假定所有SAX接口都是同步的： parse 完成之前，解析方法必须不返回，并且读者必须等待事件处理程序回调返回后，才能报告下一个事件。

trans-unit.source: All SAX1 parsers must also implement a zero-argument constructor (though other constructors are also allowed).
trans-unit.target: 所有SAX1解析器都必须实现零参数构造函数(尽管也允许使用其他构造函数)。

trans-unit.source: All SAX1 parsers must implement this basic interface: it allows applications to register handlers for different types of events and to initiate a parse from a URI, or a character stream.
trans-unit.target: 所有SAX1解析器都必须实现这个基本接口:它允许应用程序为不同类型的事件注册处理程序,并从URI或字符流启动解析。

trans-unit.source: All VMDeathEvents will be in a single EventSet, no other events will be in the event set. A resume must occur to continue execution after any event set which performs suspensions - in this case to allow proper shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 所有VMDeathEvents将在单个 EventSet 中，而其他事件将不在该事件集中。必须执行恢复才能继续执行任何暂停后的事件集-在这种情况下，允许适当的关闭。

trans-unit.source: All X.509 certificate extensions that a PKIXCertPathChecker might possibly be able to process should be included in the set.

trans-unit.source: All XMLReaders are required to support setting http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces to true and http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes to false.
trans-unit.target: 所有的XMLReaders都需要支持将http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces 设置为true,将http://xml.org/sax/features/namespace-prefixes 设置为false。

trans-unit.source: All access checks start from a Lookup object, which compares its recorded lookup class against all requests to create method handles. A single Lookup object can be used to create any number of access-checked method handles, all checked against a single lookup class.
trans-unit.target: 所有访问检查都从一个 Lookup 对象开始，该对象将其记录的查找类与所有创建方法句柄的请求进行比较。单个 Lookup 对象可用于创建任意数量的已通过访问检查的方法句柄，所有这些句柄都是针对单个Lookup类进行检查的。

trans-unit.source: All attributes that specify measurements and distances controlling the shape of the returned outline are measured in the same coordinate system as the original unstroked Shape argument. When a Graphics2D object uses a Stroke object to redefine a path during the execution of one of its draw methods, the geometry is supplied in its original form before the Graphics2D transform attribute is applied. Therefore, attributes such as the pen width are interpreted in the user space coordinate system of the Graphics2D object and are subject to the scaling and shearing effects of the user-space-to-device-space transform in that particular Graphics2D. For example, the width of a rendered shape's outline is determined not only by the width attribute of this BasicStroke, but also by the transform attribute of the Graphics2D object. Consider this code:
trans-unit.target: 所有指定度量和控制返回轮廓形状的距离的属性都将在与原始未描边的 Shape 参数相同的坐标系中进行测量。当 Graphics2D 对象在执行其 draw 方法之一的过程中使用 Stroke 对象重新定义路径时，将在应用 Graphics2D transform属性之前以其原始形式提供几何图形。因此，诸如笔宽之类的属性在 Graphics2D 对象的用户空间坐标系中进行解释，并受该特定 Graphics2D 中用户空间到设备空间变换的缩放和剪切作用的影响。。例如，渲染形状轮廓的宽度不仅由此 BasicStroke 的width属性确定，而且还由 Graphics2D 对象的transform属性确定。考虑以下代码：

trans-unit.source: All breakpoints in the redefined classes are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 重新定义的类中的所有断点都被删除。

trans-unit.source: All but the first two (FilePermission and SocketPermission) are subclasses of java.security.BasicPermission, which itself is an abstract subclass of the top-level class for permissions, which is java.security.Permission. BasicPermission defines the functionality needed for all permissions that contain a name that follows the hierarchical property naming convention (for example, "exitVM", "setFactory", "queuePrintJob", etc). An asterisk may appear at the end of the name, following a ".", or by itself, to signify a wildcard match. For example: "a.*" or "*" is valid, "*a" or "a*b" is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 所有，但前两个（的FilePermission和的SocketPermission）是的子类 java.security.BasicPermission ，它本身是顶层类的权限，这是一个抽象类 java.security.Permission 中。 BasicPermission定义所有权限的功能，这些权限包含遵循分层属性命名约定的名称（例如，“ exitVM”，“ setFactory”，“ queuePrintJob”等）。星号可能会出现在名称的末尾，在“。”之后，或者单独出现，表示通配符匹配。例如：“ a。*”或“ *”有效，“ * a”或“ a * b”无效。

trans-unit.target: 所有字节值 '\u0000' 至 '\u0020' 被视为空白。

trans-unit.source: All bytes in digesta are examined to determine equality. The calculation time depends only on the length of digesta. It does not depend on the length of digestb or the contents of digesta and digestb.
trans-unit.target: 检查 digesta 中的所有字节以确定是否相等。计算时间仅取决于 digesta 的长度。它不依赖于长度 digestb 或内容 digesta 和 digestb 。

trans-unit.source: All cached resource bundles are subject to removal from the cache due to memory constraints of the runtime environment. Returning a large positive value doesn't mean to lock loaded resource bundles in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 由于运行时环境的内存限制,所有缓存的资源束都会被从缓存中移除。返回一个大的正值并不意味着将加载的资源束锁定在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: All calculations should check for numeric overflow and throw either an ArithmeticException or a DateTimeException.
trans-unit.target: 所有计算都应检查数值溢出，并抛出 ArithmeticException 或 DateTimeException 。

trans-unit.source: All calculations should check for numeric overflow and throw either an ArithmeticException or a DateTimeException.
trans-unit.target: 所有计算都应检查数值溢出，并抛出 ArithmeticException 或 DateTimeException 。

trans-unit.source: All characters are written as they are, including the line separators in the char sequence. No extra characters are added.
trans-unit.target: 所有字符都按原样书写,包括字符序列中的换行符。不添加额外的字符。

trans-unit.source: All characters from the first one to the first dot are set to be lower-case characters
trans-unit.target: 从第一个到第一个点的所有字符都被设置为小写字符。

trans-unit.source: All classes implementing this interface and overriding this method must call TemporalAccessor.super.query(query). JDK classes may avoid calling super if they provide behavior equivalent to the default behaviour, however non-JDK classes may not utilize this optimization and must call super.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口并重写此方法的所有类都必须调用 TemporalAccessor.super.query(query) 。如果JDK类提供的行为等同于默认行为，则可以避免调用super，但是非JDK类可能无法利用此优化，而必须调用 super 。

trans-unit.source: All colors returned by DefaultMetalTheme are completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: DefaultMetalTheme 返回的所有颜色都是完全不透明的。

trans-unit.source: All colors returned by OceanTheme are completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: OceanTheme 返回的所有颜色都是完全不透明的。

trans-unit.source: All comments are labeled with this tag.
trans-unit.target: 所有的评论都带有这个标签。

trans-unit.source: All constructors are protected. The correct way to create a Raster is to use one of the static create methods defined in this class. These methods create instances of Raster that use the standard Interleaved, Banded, and Packed SampleModels and that may be processed more efficiently than a Raster created by combining an externally generated SampleModel and DataBuffer.
trans-unit.target: 所有的构造函数都是受保护的。创建Raster的正确方法是使用本类中定义的静态创建方法之一。这些方法创建了使用标准的Interleaved、Banded和Packed SampleModels的Raster实例,这些实例的处理效率可能比通过结合外部生成的SampleModel和DataBuffer创建的Raster更高。

trans-unit.source: All coordinates passed to a Graphics2D object are specified in a device-independent coordinate system called User Space, which is used by applications. The Graphics2D object contains an AffineTransform object as part of its rendering state that defines how to convert coordinates from user space to device-dependent coordinates in Device Space.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 Graphics2D 对象的所有坐标都在称为用户空间的设备无关坐标系中指定，该坐标系供应用程序使用。所述 Graphics2D 对象包含一个 AffineTransform 对象作为其渲染状态定义如何从用户空间坐标转换为与设备相关的坐标在设备空间的一部分。

trans-unit.source: All coordinates that appear as arguments to the methods of this Graphics object are considered relative to the translation origin of this Graphics object prior to the invocation of the method.
trans-unit.target: 显示作为参数传递给该方法的所有坐标 Graphics 对象是这个翻译的起源被认为相对 Graphics 之前，该方法的调用对象。

trans-unit.source: All correctly implemented Era classes are singletons, thus it is valid code to write date.getEra() == SomeChrono.ERA_NAME).
trans-unit.target: 所有正确实现的 Era 类都是单例，因此编写 date.getEra() == SomeChrono.ERA_NAME) 是有效的代码。

trans-unit.source: All date/time datatype fields set to DatatypeConstants.FIELD_UNDEFINED or null.
trans-unit.target: 所有日期/时间数据类型字段都设置为 DatatypeConstants.FIELD_UNDEFINED 或为null。

trans-unit.source: All declarations reported through DTDHandler or DeclHandler events must appear between the startDTD and endDTD events. Declarations are assumed to belong to the internal DTD subset unless they appear between startEntity and endEntity events. Comments and processing instructions from the DTD should also be reported between the startDTD and endDTD events, in their original order of (logical) occurrence; they are not required to appear in their correct locations relative to DTDHandler or DeclHandler events, however.
trans-unit.target: 通过 DTDHandler 或 DeclHandler 事件报告的所有声明必须出现在startDTD和 endDTD 事件之间。除非声明出现在 startEntity 和 endEntity 事件之间，否则假定它们属于内部DTD子集。来自DTD的注释和处理指令还应该在startDTD和endDTD事件之间以其（逻辑）发生的原始顺序进行报告；但是，它们不需要出现在相对于DTDHandler或DeclHandler事件的正确位置。

trans-unit.source: All default attributes must be present on elements when the elements are passed to the filter methods. All other default content must be passed to the filter methods.
trans-unit.target: 当元素被传递给过滤器方法时,所有的默认属性必须存在于元素上。所有其他的默认内容都必须传递给过滤器方法。

trans-unit.source: All default handler implementations must provide a public zero-argument constructor.
trans-unit.target: 所有的默认处理程序实现必须提供一个公共的零参数构造函数。

trans-unit.source: All dialogs are modal. Each showXxxDialog method blocks the caller until the user's interaction is complete.
trans-unit.target: 所有对话框都是模态的。每个 showXxxDialog 方法都会阻止调用者，直到用户的交互完成为止。

trans-unit.source: All documents need to be able to add and remove simple text. Typically, text is inserted and removed via gestures from a keyboard or a mouse. What effect the insertion or removal has upon the document structure is entirely up to the implementation of the document.
trans-unit.target: 所有的文档都需要能够添加和删除简单的文本。通常情况下,文本是通过键盘或鼠标的手势插入和删除的。插入或删除对文档结构有什么影响,完全取决于文档的实现。

trans-unit.source: All elements are permitted, including null.

trans-unit.source: All function executions (except init functions) will be passed the internal parameter list, consisting of the non-void iteration values (v...) (in clause order) and then the loop inputs (a...) (in argument order).
trans-unit.target: 所有函数执行（init函数除外）都将传递内部参数列表，该列表由非 void 迭代值 (v...) （按子句顺序）然后是循环输入 (a...) （按参数顺序）组成）。

trans-unit.source: All general-purpose Collection implementation classes (which typically implement Collection indirectly through one of its subinterfaces) should provide two "standard" constructors: a void (no arguments) constructor, which creates an empty collection, and a constructor with a single argument of type Collection, which creates a new collection with the same elements as its argument. In effect, the latter constructor allows the user to copy any collection, producing an equivalent collection of the desired implementation type. There is no way to enforce this convention (as interfaces cannot contain constructors) but all of the general-purpose Collection implementations in the Java platform libraries comply.
trans-unit.target: 所有通用的 Collection 实现类（通常通过其子接口之一间接实现 Collection ）都应提供两个“标准”构造函数：一个void（无参数）构造函数，用于创建一个空集合；以及一个构造函数，其类型为单个参数 Collection ，它将创建一个新集合，其元素与其参数相同。实际上，后一个构造函数允许用户复制任何集合，从而生成所需实现类型的等效集合。无法强制执行此约定（因为接口不能包含构造函数），但是Java平台库中的所有通用 Collection 实现都可以遵循。

trans-unit.source: All general-purpose map implementation classes should provide two "standard" constructors: a void (no arguments) constructor which creates an empty map, and a constructor with a single argument of type Map, which creates a new map with the same key-value mappings as its argument. In effect, the latter constructor allows the user to copy any map, producing an equivalent map of the desired class. There is no way to enforce this recommendation (as interfaces cannot contain constructors) but all of the general-purpose map implementations in the JDK comply.
trans-unit.target: 所有通用地图实现类都应提供两个“标准”构造函数：一个void（无参数）构造函数，用于创建一个空的地图；以及一个具有单个 Map 类型参数的构造函数，其用于创建具有相同键值的新地图。映射作为其参数。实际上，后一个构造函数允许用户复制任何映射，从而生成所需类的等效映射。无法执行此建议（因为接口不能包含构造函数），但是JDK中的所有通用映射实现都可以遵循。

trans-unit.source: All general-purpose sorted map implementation classes should provide four "standard" constructors. It is not possible to enforce this recommendation though as required constructors cannot be specified by interfaces. The expected "standard" constructors for all sorted map implementations are:
trans-unit.target: 所有通用的排序图实现类都应该提供四个 "标准 "构造函数。但由于所需的构造函数不能由接口来指定,所以不可能强制执行这个建议。所有排序地图实现的预期 "标准 "构造函数是:?

trans-unit.source: All general-purpose sorted set implementation classes should provide four "standard" constructors: 1) A void (no arguments) constructor, which creates an empty sorted set sorted according to the natural ordering of its elements. 2) A constructor with a single argument of type Comparator, which creates an empty sorted set sorted according to the specified comparator. 3) A constructor with a single argument of type Collection, which creates a new sorted set with the same elements as its argument, sorted according to the natural ordering of the elements. 4) A constructor with a single argument of type SortedSet, which creates a new sorted set with the same elements and the same ordering as the input sorted set. There is no way to enforce this recommendation, as interfaces cannot contain constructors.
trans-unit.target: 所有通用排序集实现类都应提供四个“标准”构造函数：1）一个void（无参数）构造函数，该构造函数将创建一个空的排序集，并根据其元素的自然顺序对其进行排序。 2）具有一个类型为 Comparator 的单个参数的构造函数，它将创建一个空的排序集，该集根据指定的比较器进行排序。 3）一个具有单个 Collection 类型参数的构造函数，该构造函数将创建一个新的排序集合，该集合具有与其参数相同的元素，并根据元素的自然顺序进行排序。 4）具有一个 SortedSet 类型的单个参数的构造函数，这将创建一个新的排序集，其元素与输入排序集的元素和排序相同。由于接口不能包含构造函数，因此无法强制执行此建议。

trans-unit.source: All graphical information returned from a TextLayout object's methods is relative to the origin of the TextLayout, which is the intersection of the TextLayout object's baseline with its left edge. Also, coordinates passed into a TextLayout object's methods are assumed to be relative to the TextLayout object's origin. Clients usually need to translate between a TextLayout object's coordinate system and the coordinate system in another object (such as a Graphics object).
trans-unit.target: 从 TextLayout 对象的方法返回的所有图形信息均相对于 TextLayout 的原点，该原点是 TextLayout 对象的基线与其左边缘的交集。同样，假定传递到 TextLayout 对象的方法中的坐标是相对于 TextLayout 对象的原点的。客户通常需要在 TextLayout 对象的坐标系和另一个对象（例如 Graphics 对象）中的坐标系之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: All icons added by the application are automatically removed from the SystemTray upon application exit and also when the desktop system tray becomes unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 在退出应用程序时以及桌面系统托盘不可用时，应用程序添加的所有图标都会自动从 SystemTray 中删除。

trans-unit.source: All methods adhere to the above triggering, execution, and exceptional completion specifications (which are not repeated in individual method specifications). trans-unit.source: All methods and constructors in this class throw NullPointerException when passed a null object reference for any input parameter. BigInteger must support values in the range -2Integer.MAX_VALUE (exclusive) to +2Integer.MAX_VALUE (exclusive) and may support values outside of that range. An ArithmeticException is thrown when a BigInteger constructor or method would generate a value outside of the supported range. The range of probable prime values is limited and may be less than the full supported positive range of BigInteger. The range must be at least 1 to 2500000000.
trans-unit.target: 为任何输入参数传递空对象引用时，此类中的所有方法和构造函数都将引发 NullPointerException 。 BigInteger必须支持介于-2 Integer.MAX_VALUE （不包括）到+2 Integer.MAX_VALUE （不包括）之间的值，并且可以支持该范围之外的值。一个 ArithmeticException 被抛出时的BigInteger构造方法或方法将产生支持的范围的值之外。可能质数的范围是有限的，并且可能小于 BigInteger 的完整支持的正数范围。范围必须至少为1到2 500000000。

trans-unit.source: All methods define whether they accept or return null in the Javadoc. Typically this is expressed as "not null". If a null parameter is used where it is not allowed, a java.lang.NullPointerException is thrown. If a null parameters is passed to a method that throws other exceptions, such as java.io.IOException, the java.lang.NullPointerException takes precedence, unless the Javadoc for the method explicitly states how null is handled, i.e. by throwing java.lang.IllegalArgumentException.
trans-unit.target: 所有方法都定义它们在Javadoc中接受还是返回 null 。通常，这表示为 "not null" 。如果在不允许的地方使用 null 参数，则抛出 java.lang.NullPointerException 。如果将 null 参数传递给引发其他异常的方法，例如 java.io.IOException ，则 java.lang.NullPointerException 优先，除非该方法的Javadoc明确声明如何处理 null ，即通过引发 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: All methods first check to see if the actual modCount of the backing list is equal to its expected value, and throw a ConcurrentModificationException if it is not.
trans-unit.target: 所有方法首先检查后备列表的实际 modCount 是否等于其期望值，如果不相等，则抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。

trans-unit.source: All methods in this class accept null values for keys and values. However, null keys will never will be present in HTTP request headers, and will not be output/sent in response headers. Null values can be represented as either a null entry for the key (i.e. the list is null) or where the key has a list, but one (or more) of the list's values is null. Null values are output as a header line containing the key but no associated value.

The default set of data is supplied by the IANA Time Zone Database (TZDB). This has region IDs of the form '{area}/{city}', such as 'Europe/Paris' or 'America/New_York'. This is compatible with most IDs from TimeZone.

trans-unit.source: All platforms support file-modification times to the nearest second, but some provide more precision. The argument will be truncated to fit the supported precision. trans-unit.source: All properties whose names end with ".level" are assumed to define log levels for Loggers. Thus "foo.level" defines a log level for the logger called "foo" and (recursively) for any of its children in the naming hierarchy. Log Levels are applied in the order they are defined in the properties file. Thus level settings for child nodes in the tree should come after settings for their parents. The property name ".level" can be used to set the level for the root of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 所有名称以".level "结尾的属性都被认为是为记录仪定义了日志级别。因此,"foo.level "为名为 "foo "的记录仪及其命名层次结构中的任何子代定义了日志级别(递归)。日志级别按其在属性文件中定义的顺序应用。因此,树中子节点的级别设置应在其父节点的设置之后进行。属性名".level "可用于设置树的根节点的级别。

trans-unit.source: All public methods of CertStore objects must be thread-safe. trans-unit.target: CertStore 对象的所有公共方法都必须是线程安全的。也就是说，多个线程可以并发地在单个 CertStore 对象（或多个）上调用这些方法，而不会产生不良影响。例如，这允许 CertPathBuilder 搜索CRL，同时搜索其他证书。

trans-unit.source: All row data in the table has changed, listeners should discard any state that was based on the rows and requery the TableModel to get the new row count and all the appropriate values. The structure of the table ie, the column names, types and order have not changed.

trans-unit.source: All rowsets maintain a set of properties, which will usually be set using a tool. The number and kinds of properties a rowset has will vary, depending on what the RowSet implementation does and how it gets its data. For example, rowsets that get their data from a ResultSet object need to set the properties that are required for making a database connection. If a RowSet object uses the DriverManager facility to make a connection, it needs to set a property for the JDBC URL that identifies the appropriate driver, and it needs to set the properties that give the user name and password. If, on the other hand, the rowset uses a DataSource object to make the connection, which is the preferred method, it does not need to set the property for the JDBC URL. Instead, it needs to set the property for the logical name of the data source along with the properties for the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 所有行集都维护一组属性，通常使用工具来设置这些属性。行集具有的属性的数量和种类将有所不同，具体取决于 RowSet 实现的功能以及如何获取其数据。例如，从 ResultSet 对象获取数据的行集需要设置进行数据库连接所需的属性。如果 RowSet 对象使用 DriverManager 工具进行连接，则需要为JDBC URL设置一个标识适当驱动程序的属性，并且需要设置提供用户名和密码的属性。另一方面，如果行集使用 DataSource 进行连接的对象（这是首选方法），它不需要为JDBC URL设置属性。相反，它需要设置数据源逻辑名称的属性以及用户名和密码的属性。

trans-unit.source: All rowsets maintain a set of properties, which will usually be set using a tool. The number and kinds of properties a rowset has will vary, depending on what the rowset does and how it gets its data. For example, rowsets that get their data from a ResultSet object need to set the properties that are required for making a database connection. If a rowset uses the DriverManager facility to make a connection, it needs to set a property for the JDBC URL that identifies the appropriate driver, and it needs to set the properties that give the user name and password. If, on the other hand, the rowset uses a DataSource object to make the connection, which is the preferred method, it does not need to set the property for the JDBC URL. Instead, it needs to set properties for the logical name of the data source, for the user name, and for the password.
trans-unit.target: 所有行集都维护一组属性，通常使用工具来设置这些属性。行集具有的属性的数量和种类将有所不同，具体取决于行集执行的操作以及如何获取其数据。例如，从 ResultSet 对象获取数据的行集需要设置进行数据库连接所需的属性。如果行集使用 DriverManager 工具进行连接，则需要为JDBC URL设置一个标识适当驱动程序的属性，并且需要设置提供用户名和密码的属性。另一方面，如果行集使用 DataSource 进行连接的对象（这是首选方法），它不需要为JDBC URL设置属性。相反，它需要为数据源的逻辑名，用户名和密码设置属性。

trans-unit.source: All soft references to softly-reachable objects are guaranteed to have been cleared before the virtual machine throws an OutOfMemoryError. Otherwise no constraints are placed upon the time at which a soft reference will be cleared or the order in which a set of such references to different objects will be cleared. Virtual machine implementations are, however, encouraged to bias against clearing recently-created or recently-used soft references.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟机引发 OutOfMemoryError 之前，确保已清除对软可访问对象的所有软引用。否则，在清除软引用的时间或清除对不同对象的一组此类引用的时间上没有任何限制。但是，鼓励虚拟机实现偏向于清除最近创建或最近使用的软引用。

trans-unit.source: All units have a duration, however the duration is not always accurate. For example, days have an estimated duration due to the possibility of daylight saving time changes. This method returns true if the duration is an estimate and false if it is accurate. Note that accurate/estimated ignores leap seconds.
trans-unit.target: 所有单位都有一个持续时间,但持续时间并不总是准确的。例如,由于夏令时的变化,天数有一个估计的持续时间。如果持续时间是估计值,本方法返回true,如果是精确值,则返回false。请注意,精确/估计会忽略闰秒。

trans-unit.source: All units return a duration measured in standard nanoseconds from this method. The duration will be positive and non-zero. For example, an hour has a duration of 60 * 60 * 1,000,000,000ns.
trans-unit.target: 从此方法，所有单位都返回以标准纳秒为单位测量的持续时间。持续时间将为正且非零。例如，一个小时的持续时间为 60 * 60 * 1,000,000,000ns 。

trans-unit.source: All validity checking while parsing a document occurs on the source document as it appears on the input stream, not on the DOM document as it is built in memory. With filters, the document in memory may be a subset of the document on the stream, and its validity may have been affected by the filtering.
trans-unit.target: 在解析文档时,所有的有效性检查都发生在源文档上,因为它出现在输入流上,而不是建立在内存中的DOM文档上。对于过滤器,内存中的文档可能是流中文档的一个子集,其有效性可能已经受到过滤的影响。

trans-unit.source: All values are refetched subject to the transaction isolation level and cursor sensitivity. If refreshRow is called after calling an updater method, but before calling the method updateRow, then the updates made to the row are lost. Calling the method refreshRow frequently will likely slow performance.
trans-unit.target: 根据事务隔离级别和游标敏感度来重新获取所有值。如果 refreshRow 被调用更新方法之后，但在调用该方法之前 updateRow ，然后到行所作的更新都将丢失。频繁调用方法 refreshRow 可能会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: All write methods call into this one. If getCanWrapLines() returns false, this will call output with each sequence of chars that doesn't contain a NEWLINE, followed by a call to writeLineSeparator. On the other hand, if getCanWrapLines() returns true, this will split the string, as necessary, so getLineLength is honored. The only exception is if the current string contains no whitespace, and won't fit in which case the line length will exceed getLineLength.
trans-unit.target: 所有写方法都调用此方法。如果 getCanWrapLines() 返回false，则将使用不包含NEWLINE的每个 chars 序列调用 output ，然后调用 writeLineSeparator 。另一方面，如果 getCanWrapLines() 返回true，则将在必要时拆分字符串，因此可以使用 getLineLength 。唯一的例外是，如果当前字符串不包含空格，并且不适合这种情况，则 getLineLength 将超过getLineLength。

trans-unit.target: 允许应用程序注册一个实体解析器。

trans-unit.target: 允许应用程序注册一个错误事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Allow an application to request a locale for errors and warnings.
trans-unit.target: 允许应用程序为错误和警告请求一个locale。

trans-unit.source: Allow cleanup after the remote call has completed.
trans-unit.target: 允许在远程呼叫完成后进行清理。

trans-unit.source: Allow revocation check to succeed if the revocation status cannot be determined for one of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 如果由于以下原因之一无法确定废止状态,则允许废止检查成功。

trans-unit.source: Allow revocation check to succeed if the revocation status cannot be determined for one of the following reasons: The CRL or OCSP response cannot be obtained because of a network error.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于以下原因之一无法确定撤销状态,允许撤销检查成功。由于网络错误,无法获得CRL或OCSP响应。

trans-unit.source: Allow the application to adjust the type of JOIN imposed on tables contained within the JoinRowSet object instance.
trans-unit.target: 允许应用程序调整对JoinRowSet对象实例中包含的表施加的 JOIN 类型。

trans-unit.source: Allow the application to adjust the type of JOIN imposed on tables contained within the JoinRowSet object instance. Implementations should throw a SQLException if they do not support a given JOIN type.
trans-unit.target: 允许应用程序调整对JoinRowSet对象实例中包含的表施加的 JOIN 类型。如果实现不支持给定的 JOIN 类型，则应抛出SQLException 。

trans-unit.source: Allow the application to resolve external entities.
trans-unit.target: 允许应用程序解析外部实体。
